mapper.select: select count(pj_no) from pj where user_id=#{user_id} and step_no='1'

select count(pj_no)from( select n.pj_no, n.user_id, n.user_name, n.pj_title, n.pj_start, n.pj_end, n.step_no from( select p.pj_no, p.user_id, e.user_name, p.pj_title, p.pj_start, p.pj_end, p.step_no from pj p join user e on p.user_id = e.user_id where p.rec_user_id = #{user_id} and p.step_no = '4' order by CAST(p.pj_no AS UNSIGNED) DESC ) n ) b

select t.* from ( select @rownum := @rownum + 1 AS rownum, p.pj_no, p.user_id, e.user_name, p.pj_title, p.pj_start, p.pj_end, p.step_no from pj p join user e on p.user_id = e.user_id, (SELECT @rownum := 0) r where p.rec_user_id = #{param1} and p.step_no != '1' order by p.pj_no DESC ) t where t.rownum between #{param2} and #{param3}

select task_no, cg_no, task_name, rec_name, user_name, task_step_no, deadline, rec_user_id , send_date, file_name, sign from( select rownum r,t.task_no, t.cg_no, task_name, rec_name, user_name, t.task_step_no, deadline, rec_user_id , t.send_date, t.file_name, t.sign from task t join task_step s on t.task_step_no = s.task_step_no left outer join (select p.task_no, p.user_id, t.cg_no from task t join task_people p on t.task_no = p.task_no where p.user_id = #{user_id} and cg_no = '1') p on t.task_no = p.task_no where rec_user_id = #{user_id} and t.cg_no = '1' and t.step_no = '1' and t.task_step_no != '4' and t.task_step_no != '5' or p.user_id is not null order by abs(trunc(to_date(deadline) - to_date(to_char(sysdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd')))) asc ) where r between 1 and 5
select count(*) cnt from task where rec_user_id=#{user_id} and rec_date is null and rec_del_check = '0'

select count(*) cnt from pj p join pj_step s on p.pj_step_no = s.pj_step_no join user e on p.user_id = e.user_id join low_dept l on e.low_dept_no = l.low_dept_no where ((pj_no in (select distinct(pj_no) from pjd where pjd_no in (select pjd_no from pjd_people where user_id=#{user_id}))) or p.user_id=#{user_id}) and step_no = (select step_no from approval where step_name='승인')
select user_id from user_detail where user_id=#{user_id}

select regdate, in_time, out_time, add_time from (select regdate, in_time, out_time, add_time from commute where user_id=#{param1} and add_time is not null and add_time!='00:00' and regdate between to_char(to_date(#{param2}, 'YYYY-MM-dd'), 'YYYY-MM-dd') and to_char(to_date(#{param3}, 'YYYY-MM-dd'), 'YYYY-MM-dd') order by regdate asc)

select round((sum(to_number(to_char(to_date(commute_time,'hh24:mi'),'hh24'))*60)+ sum(to_number(to_char(to_date(commute_time,'hh24:mi'),'mi'))))/count(commute_time)) from (select commute_time from commute c join user e on c.user_id=e.user_id where e.low_dept_no = (select low_dept_no from userDto where user_id=#{user_id}) and commute_time is not null and substr(regdate, 0,7)=to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-mm'))
select count(task_no) from task where rec_user_id =#{user_id} and step_no='4'

select round((sum(to_number(to_char(to_date(commute_time,'hh24:mi'),'hh24'))*60 ) + sum(to_number(to_char(to_date(commute_time,'hh24:mi'),'mi'))))/count(commute_time)) from commute where user_id=#{user_id} and substr(regdate, 0,7)=to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-mm') and commute_time is not null
select count(d.draft_no) from draft_ref r join draft d on r.draft_no = d.draft_no where rec_date is null and r.user_id = #{user_id}
